wikipedia_page.main: William Rees Thomas (20 August 1903 – 30 November 1991) was a Welsh footballer.Thomas attained two caps for the Wales national football team in 1930 against England and Scotland. Thomas played club football for Newport County.

response: William, Will, Willie, Bill, Billie, or Billy Thomas may refer to:
* Billy Thomas (born 1953), drummer with McBride & the Ride
* Billy Thomas (Australian footballer) (1902–1968), Australian rules footballer
